Terms and Conditions 1. Introduction
Welcome to CounterApp. By downloading or using our app, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
2. User Obligations
You must be at least 13 years old to use CounterApp. You agree not to use the app for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. 3. Intellectual Property
All content, trademarks, and data on CounterApp, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the property of CounterApp or its licensors.
4. Data and Privacy
By using the app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
5. Limitation of Liability
CounterApp is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee that the app will be available at all times or free of errors.
6. Termination
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to CounterApp at any time, without notice or liability, for any reason.
7. Changes to Terms
We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the app will constitute acceptance of the new terms.
8. Governing Law
These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country/State].

Privacy Policy 1. Introduction
This Privacy Policy explains how CounterApp collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our app.
2. Information We Collect
Usage Data: We collect data on how the app is accessed and used. This includes the duration of timers and counter progress. Personal Data: We do not collect any personal data unless you choose to provide it. 3. Use of Data
Usage Data: To improve the functionality and user experience of CounterApp. Personal Data: If provided, to communicate with you and improve our services. 4. Data Storage and Security
We take reasonable measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
5. Data Sharing and Disclosure
We do not share or sell your data to third parties. We may disclose your data if required by law or to protect our rights.
6. Your Rights
You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data. You can do this by contacting us at [Your Contact Information].
7. Changes to Privacy Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
8. Contact Us
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [Your Contact Information].
